This document: - Identifies an individual person (Kelly Andrea Hernandez Ramirez) - Contains biographical data (birth date, place of birth, physical characteristics) - Has a photograph and fingerprint - Contains an identification number (52.862.237) - Is issued by a government authority (República de Colombia) 4. **ISSUER IDENTIFICATION** This is issued by the Colombian government (República de Colombia) through the "Registraduría Nacional" (National Registry), which is the government identification authority. 5. **CATEGORY CLASSIFICATION** This clearly fits CECRL: - Official personal identification document - Contains "CÉDULA DE CIUDADANÍA" terminology - Has personal biographical data (date of birth, place of birth, blood type, sex, height) - Individual references with photograph and fingerprint - Includes a unique government-issued identifier - Incorporates multiple security verification elements
